name: Action Bike Stunt Rider Racing - Real Test Driving Game
name_original: Action Bike Stunt Rider Racing - Real Test Driving Game
description:
We are bringing to you Action Bike Stunt Rider Racing - Real Test Driving Game, an awesome bike stunt physics game from Top Crazy Games

Do you have what it takes to achieve all 3 stars on each level? Enjoy this awesome bike physics and challenging gameplay! Thats only if you're up for the challenge...

Have fun and do awesome tricks. Backflips, front flips, wheelies, but make sure not to crash or you'll BREAK THOSE BONES

[How To Play]
- Easy simple controls
- Tap Left to Brake
- Tap Right to Accelerate
- Tilt back and forth to do tricks

[Game Features]
- Beautifully crafted 3D graphics.
- 30 Levels, challenging, try for yourself
- Multiple environments:
- Different Bikes! ALL FREE!

Play Action Bike Stunt Rider Racing - Real Test Driving Game today!
